name: CGLayer
desc: An offscreen context for reusing content drawn with Core Graphics.

items.name: init?(CGContext, size: CGSize, auxiliaryInfo: CFDictionary?)
items.desc: Creates a layer object that is associated with a graphics context.

items.name: var context: CGContext?
items.desc: Returns the graphics context associated with a layer object.

items.name: var size: CGSize
items.desc: Returns the width and height of a layer object.

items.name: class var typeID: CFTypeID
items.desc: Returns the unique type identifier used for CGLayer objects.
